name: Boulder Puzzle Dungeon
description:
Clear a path through the dungeon to reach the exit

Created so that I could get to grips with Godot and other tools

Warning: Music and SFX (Can be muted)

10 levels. 3 different mechanics

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys move the character

Move rocks by walking into them

Use shortcuts or click on control buttons

Credits

Font - VT323-Regular from Google Fonts
Icons from Material.IO
Tileset/Character from TinyRPGDungeon by Ansimuz  www.ansimuz.com
The rest was done by me
